dataTemplate.name: BCO_IDN_PHYTOSANITARY_CERT
dataTemplate.description: BCO Indonesia Shipments Missing Phytosanitary Certificate

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT ship.sail_date, ship.shipment_xid shipment_number, con.contact_xid doc_manager, sref.shipment_refnum_value booking_number, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(ssd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),'999,999,990')) containers, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(ssd3.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd3 WHERE ssd3.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ssd3.stop_num = 1) - (SELECT COUNT(ssur.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd4 ON ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd4.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.PHYTOSANITARY CERT NUMBER' AND ssd4.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ssd4.stop_num = 1),'999,999,990')) conts_miss_phyto, TO_CHAR(ship.attribute_date10,'MM/DD/YYYY') load_date, TO_CHAR(ship.sail_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') sailed_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(ship.sail_date - SYSDATE,0),'999,999,990')) days_phyto_due FROM shipment ship INNER JOIN location loc ON ship.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_base vsob ON ship.shipment_gid = vsob.shipment_gid AND vsob.order_base_gid like 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON ship.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON ship.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid WHERE ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND loc.country_code3_gid = 'IDN' AND ship.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND ((SELECT COUNT(ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit ssu INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd1.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1) > (SELECT COUNT(ssur.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd2 ON ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd2.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.PHYTOSANITARY CERT NUMBER' AND ssd2.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ssd2.stop_num = 1)) ORDER BY ship.sail_date ASC
